nodes.text: A Sith Triumvirate motif written by Mark Griskey appears in the 2004 video game Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic II: The Sith Lords. Representing the Sith Triumvirate, the leitmotif bears similarities with the mystery motif from the 2002 film Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones, and includes the first four notes of dies irae.
